name: Healthy Santa
description:
Healthy Santa

A game made for the Games Development class on the AAU Klagenfurt. 

Healthy Santa is a side-scroller game, where the player jumps into the role of Santa Claus and has to deliver the presents to the right houses on Christmas Eve, while getting disturbed by his angry wife who tries to feed him healthy food by throwing it at him.

Deliver the presents to the matching house color to get extra points. Collect cookies for additional points and milk for health.

If you get hit by too many fruits and vegetables it's game over.

What high score can you reach?

How to Play Keyboard Controls
  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to move.
  • Use left click or space bar to drop presents.
Gamepad Controls
  • Use the left analogue stick to move.
  • Use the X button (PS4) or A button (Xbox) to drop presents.
Mobile Controls
  • Tap on the left half of the screen to activate the virtual joystick to move.
  • Tap on the right half of the screen to drop presents.
General
  • Collect cookies to collect points.
  • Collect milk to get points and health.
  • Drop presents onto houses to collect points.
  • Match the present color with the house color to get additional points. Colors: Red, Blue, Green
  • Avoid healthy food. Santa don't likes healthy food.
  • Get the best high score.
